projects.name: Notebook
projects.description: Developed Notebook an innovative web application designed for efficient online assignment management, catering to both teachers and students.

projects.name: Flood Prediction UI
projects.description: Flood Prediction UI is a web user interface which can be incoporated with backend for Machine Learning(ML/AI) projects. It also uses free WeatherApi and browser GeoLocation API to fetch user's current location weather.

projects.name: Book Genre Organizer
projects.description: BookGenreOrganizer is a tool designed to automatically categorize ePub and PDF books into genre-specific folders based on their metadata. The tool fetches genre information from the Google Books API and organizes the books into folders named after their genres.

projects.name: Thoughts Tracker
projects.description: Thought Tracker offers a secure and organized digital space for individuals to store and manage their personal thoughts. By addressing the need for modernized introspection, this app simplifies thought organization and fosters a more connected and efficient reflection process.
